Checkout.successMessage: You will receive a confirmation email within a few minutes.

DealPage.aboutText1: Enjoy a great outing to {title} in {location}. This is the perfect opportunity to get away with friends or family. Take advantage of this sharp offer now and experience an unforgettable day.
DealPage.aboutText2: Whether you are looking for adventure, relaxation or culture, {title} offers something for everyone. Don't miss this chance and book your tickets today with a high discount!
DealPage.mapNotAvailable: Map view not available in demo

highlights.days: Valid on all days of the week

101.title: LEGOLAND Discovery Centre Scheveningen
101.description: Build, play and learn at the ultimate indoor LEGO playground. Perfect for creativity!

102.title: Madurodam
102.description: Discover the Netherlands in miniature and see all the highlights in one interactive park.

103.title: Dierenpark Amersfoort
103.description: Climb above the bears and dive under the penguins in this adventurous zoo for kids.

104.title: Subtropical water fun at Swimfun
104.description: Splash into adventure at the subtropical swimming paradise with slides and wild water.

105.title: Duinen Zathe
105.description: All-inclusive amusement park with cool attractions for all ages. Enjoy unlimited food and drinks!

106.title: Dolfinarium
106.description: Meet dolphins, sea lions and walruses up close in the largest marine mammal park in Europe.

107.title: Amusementspark Tivoli
107.description: The best amusement park for kids up to 12 years old. Safe, fun and exciting rides!

108.title: Kölner Zoo
108.description: Visit one of the oldest and most popular zoos in Germany with over 10,000 animals.

109.title: Eindhoven Zoo
109.description: Stand face to face with elephants, tigers and polar bears in this exciting animal park.

110.title: Berkenhof Tropical Zoo
110.description: Discover tropical butterflies, dinosaurs and an amazing indoor play jungle.

111.title: Zoo Kleve
111.description: A family-friendly zoo just across the border in Germany. Feed the farm animals yourself!

112.title: Plopsa Indoor Coevorden
112.description: Meet Maya the Bee and Bumba in this magical indoor park with over 25 attractions.

113.title: Wildlands Adventure Zoo
113.description: Travel through the jungle, savanna and polar regions in one day. A world expedition!

114.title: Ouwehands Dierenpark
114.description: See the unique giant pandas and enjoy the Bear Forest in this adventurous zoo.

115.title: Burgers' Zoo
115.description: Dive into the ocean, explore the bush and walk the desert. Discover the world's eco-displays.

116.title: Apenheul
116.description: Walk among the monkeys in this unique primate park. More than half of them roam free!

117.title: Julianatoren
117.description: More than 60 crazy attractions for the little ones. Meet Jul & Julia!

118.title: Efteling
118.description: A world of wonders awaits you in this fairytale theme park. Magic for all ages.

119.title: Phantasialand
119.description: Experience world-class thrill rides and immersive themed worlds. An unforgettable adventure.

120.title: Movie Park Germany
120.description: Hurray! I'm in the movies! Enjoy spectacular rides and shows based on your favorite films.

121.title: Beekse Bergen
121.description: Go on a safari by boat, bus, car or on foot and spot the Big Five in Hilvarenbeek.

122.title: Discover Nature Museum Brabant
122.description: Interactive museum about nature and landscape. Fun and educational for the whole family.

123.title: Spoorwegmuseum
123.description: Discover the world of trains in this railway museum. A station full of stories!

124.title: KidZcity
124.description: The largest indoor amusement park in the Randstad area. Climb, slide and play all day.

125.title: Museum Speelklok
125.description: Step into the cheerful world of self-playing musical instruments. From tiny music boxes to massive street organs, discover the mechanical marvels that have been entertaining people for centuries.

126.title: Centraal Museum
126.description: Art, design, fashion and history come together in Utrecht. From Miffy to Rietveld.

127.title: Dom Tower Climb
127.description: Climb the 465 steps for the best view of Utrecht. A historic and active experience.

128.title: Kasteel de Haar
128.description: Visit the largest and most luxurious castle in Holland. A fairytale come to life.

129.title: Midgetgolf Parkhaven
129.description: Play 18 holes of minigolf right next to the Euromast. Fun for everyone!

130.title: Lasergame Rotterdam
130.description: Tag your friends in the ship's hold arena. Exciting laser tag action in Rotterdam.

131.title: Amsterdam Boatcruises
131.description: See the canals of Amsterdam from a luxury boat. The best way to view the city.

132.title: Design Museum Den Bosch
132.description: Design history and contemporary art in Den Bosch. From jewelry to ceramics.

133.title: Kasteel Doorwerth
133.description: Explore a robust medieval castle on the Rhine. History, nature and culture.

134.title: NK Speed Skating live in Thialf
134.description: Experience the speed skating spectacle live in the stadium. Cheer for the champions!

135.title: Slagharen
135.description: Wild West adventure with over 30 attractions and shows. Yeehaw!

136.title: Prado Museum
136.description: Explore one of the world's finest European art collections, from the 12th to the early 20th century.

137.title: Uffizi Galleries
137.description: Visit the world-famous art museum in Florence and see masterpieces by Botticelli, Michelangelo, and Da Vinci.

138.title: Louvre Museum
138.description: Discover the world's largest art museum and a historic monument in Paris. Home of the Mona Lisa.

139.title: Disneyland Paris
139.description: Experience the magic of Disney with two parks, more than 50 attractions, and unforgettable shows.

140.title: Europa-Park
140.description: Germany's largest theme park with over 100 attractions and shows, and 15 European themed areas.

201.title: Sauna Het Friese Woud
201.description: Small-scale sauna with a personal atmosphere in nature. Relax in peace and quiet.

202.title: Thermen Holiday
202.description: An oasis of peace near Rotterdam with diverse facilities. Escape the daily rush.

203.title: House of Wellness
203.description: Luxury wellness resort in the heart of Amsterdam. Relaxation in the city center.

204.title: Elysium Wellness
204.description: A world of wellness with dozens of saunas and baths. A paradise for relaxation.

205.title: Spa Zuiver
205.description: Modern spa with 13,000m2 of wellness facilities. Pure enjoyment in Amsterdam.

206.title: Return Saunapark
206.description: Stylish sauna complex with a beautiful garden. Hospitality and relaxation combined.

207.title: Thermen Bussloo
207.description: Award-winning wellness resort at the lake of Bussloo. A unique wellness experience.

208.title: Thermae 2000
208.description: Relax in thermal water from their own source on the Cauberg. Wellness with a view.

209.title: Wellnessresort de Waterlelie
209.description: Green wellness oasis with unique saunas and pools. Feel reborn after a visit.

210.title: SpaPuur
210.description: Brabant hospitality and relaxation in various saunas. Enjoy the warm atmosphere.

211.title: Wellnessboot Mill
211.description: Unique wellness experience on a 40-meter luxury yacht. Wellness on the water.

212.title: Sauna Drome Putten
212.description: Authentic Finnish sauna experience in the Veluwe woods. Pure nature and tradition.

213.title: Thermen Berendonck
213.description: Magical wellness resort in the theme of 1001 Nights. Enchanting relaxation.

214.title: Sauna Swoll
214.description: Enjoy peace and space in a forest-rich environment. A hidden gem near Zwolle.

215.title: Glow Sauna Eindhoven
215.description: Private sauna experience for ultimate relaxation. Enjoy wellness in privacy.

216.title: Thermen Soesterberg
216.description: Nature, wellness and gastronomy come together here. A complete day of pampering.

301.title: Unlimited Korean BBQ & sushi at Geonbae
301.description: Grill your own meat and enjoy unlimited sushi and sides. A Korean feast!

302.title: Taste the best of Asia at Red Chilli
302.description: Authentic Asian fine dining in a modern setting. Taste the refined flavors.

303.title: All you can eat at Restaurant Arista
303.description: Unlimited enjoyment of world dishes in Teuge. Something for everyone.

304.title: Ristorante Italiano Pizzeria Romagna
304.description: Traditional Italian pizzas and pastas in Zoetermeer. Taste the love for Italy.

305.title: De Beren Schiedam-Schieveste
305.description: Enjoy delicious meat and fish dishes from the charcoal grill. Cozy and tasty.

306.title: Restaurant Fort NOXX
306.description: Atmospheric dining in a historic fort setting. A unique culinary experience.

307.title: De Lachende Koe
307.description: Cozy bistro with tasty dishes for a friendly price. Always a smile!

308.title: Restaurant Sems
308.description: Surprising combinations and wines in a casual atmosphere. Dining in Leeuwarden.

309.title: 't Havenmantsje
309.description: Culinary enjoyment with a view of the Wadden Sea. Taste the local produce.

310.title: 1892 Eten & Drinken
310.description: Honest and delicious food in a monumental building. History on your plate.

311.title: Together Food & Drinks - High Tea
311.description: Enjoy sweet and savory treats with unlimited tea. Perfect for catching up.

312.title: 't Perron - Schnitzel menu
312.description: Delicious schnitzels with fries and salad. A hearty meal for a great price.

313.title: Happy Italy
313.description: Large pizzas and fresh pastas for a happy price. The cheerful Italian.

314.title: De Beren - 3-course choice menu
314.description: Choose your favorite 3-course dinner from the grill. Great value for money.

315.title: Humphrey's
315.description: 3-course menu with Burgundian dishes in style. Atmospheric dining guaranteed.

316.title: Dunkin' Donuts - 6 Donuts
316.description: Treat yourself to a box of 6 famous donuts. Sweet, colorful and delicious!

501.title: Wiro Wok All You Can Eat
501.description: Unlimited enjoyment of Asian cuisine. Wok, sushi and grill dishes.

502.title: La Cubanita Tapas
502.description: Unlimited tapas in a Cuban atmosphere. Enjoy cocktails and delicious small dishes.

601.title: Boating License Course
601.description: Get your boating license quickly and easily with this online course. Including exam training.

602.title: Golf Proficiency Certificate (GVB)
602.description: Learn to play golf and get your GVB. Includes lessons from a pro and exam.

603.title: Drift Course
603.description: Experience the adrenaline of drifting. Learn to control the car under extreme conditions.

604.title: Photography Course
604.description: Learn the basics of photography or improve your skills. Capture the most beautiful moments.

701.title: BP Carwash
701.description: Let your car shine again with the best washing programs from BP.

702.title: Car Interior Cleaning
702.description: Professional cleaning of your car interior. Fresh and clean again.

703.title: Ski & Outdoor Store
703.description: Prepare for your winter sports with the best gear. Skis, clothing and accessories.

704.title: Car Waxing
704.description: Protect your car paint and make it shine with a professional wax treatment.

801.title: Kinepolis Cinema
801.description: Enjoy the latest films on the big screen. Comfortable seats and perfect sound.

802.title: Pathé Thuis
802.description: Watch the best movies at home on your couch. From blockbusters to arthouse.

803.title: Comedy Club Haug
803.description: An evening full of laughter with the best stand-up comedians from home and abroad.

804.title: Holland Casino
804.description: Experience an exciting evening out. Waag a gamble and enjoy the atmosphere.

901.title: HotelMoment
901.description: Enjoy a wonderful overnight stay in a luxury hotel. Includes breakfast.

902.title: Fletcher Hotels
902.description: Discover the most beautiful places in the Netherlands with a stay at Fletcher.

903.title: Preston Palace
903.description: All-inclusive enjoyment in Almelo. Food, drinks and entertainment included.

904.title: Roompot Holidays
904.description: Vier vacation in your own country in a luxury bungalow or chalet.

1001.title: Wine Advantage Package
1001.description: A selection of the best wines. Perfect for drinks or dinner.

1002.title: Online Wine Tasting
1002.description: Taste different wines under the guidance of an expert, simply from home.

1003.title: Photo on Canvas
1003.description: Have your favorite photo printed on high-quality canvas. A beautiful memory on the wall.

1004.title: Happy Socks Box
1004.description: Bring color to your day with these cheerful socks. Also nice to give as a gift.

1101.title: Bowling Night
1101.description: An hour of bowling with friends or family. Includes shoe rental.

1102.title: Indoor Karting
1102.description: Race on the fastest indoor track. Who sets the fastest lap time?

1103.title: Lasergame Arena
1103.description: Enter the arena and defeat your opponents in this exciting laser game.

1104.title: Trampoline Park
1104.description: Jump around in the largest trampoline park. Fun for young and old.

1105.title: Escape Room
1105.description: Can you escape within 60 minutes? Solve the puzzles and find the exit.

401.title: Nationaal Videogame Museum
401.description: Come and discover the new location of the National Videogame Museum in Zoetermeer. Play the classics!

402.title: Bonami SpelComputer Museum
402.description: Bonami Game Console Museum in Zwolle is an All-in concept. Play retro games and see consoles.

403.title: Museum of the Twentieth Century
403.description: Step back in time at the Museum of the Twentieth Century in Hoorn. Nostalgia from 1900-2000.

404.title: Old Crafts & Toys Museum
404.description: Take a trip down memory lane at the Old Crafts & Toys Museum in Terschuur. Toys and crafts.

405.title: Design Museum Den Bosch
405.description: From jewelry to ceramics, discover modern design history in Den Bosch.

406.title: Discover Nature Museum Brabant
406.description: Experience nature through exhibitions and activities. A museum for curious minds.

407.title: Spoorwegmuseum
407.description: A station full of stories and historic trains. The world of railways comes alive.

408.title: Museum Speelklok
408.description: Cheerful self-playing musical instruments. The happiest museum in the Netherlands.

409.title: Centraal Museum
409.description: Old masters and modern art under one roof. The cultural heart of Utrecht.

410.title: Rijksmuseum
410.description: Visit the Rijksmuseum in Amsterdam and discover the masterpieces of the Dutch Golden Age.

411.title: Van Gogh Museum
411.description: Discover the largest collection of artworks by Vincent van Gogh. Masterpieces and letters.

412.title: Anne Frank House
412.description: Visit the Anne Frank House in Amsterdam. See the secret annex and the diary.

420.title: Artis Zoo
420.description: Visit the oldest zoo in the Netherlands. Admire thousands of animals and blooming gardens in the heart of Amsterdam.

421.title: Micropia
421.description: Discover the invisible world of microbes. The world's first museum dedicated to microorganisms.

422.title: Museum van Loon
422.description: Step into the Golden Age. Explore this magnificent canal house and discover how a wealthy family lived in the 17th century.

423.title: Ons' Lieve Heer op Solder
423.description: A hidden church in the attic. Experience the Dutch Golden Age in this uniquely preserved 17th-century canal house.

Legal.privacyDescription: Read our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information at Trippa.
Legal.privacyIntro: At Trippa, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you visit our website.
Legal.privacyCollectionText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and payment information.
Legal.privacyUsageText: We use your information to provide our services, process transactions, communicate with you, and improve our website. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
Legal.privacyContactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@trippa.online.
Legal.termsDescription: Read our Terms & Conditions to understand the rules and regulations for using the Trippa website.
Legal.termsIntro: Welcome to Trippa. By accessing this website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use.
Legal.termsUsageText: You agree to use this website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the website.
Legal.termsLiabilityText: Trippa is not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use this website or any information contained herein.
Legal.termsContactText: If you have any questions about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us at info@trippa.online.
Legal.refundDescription: Read our Refund Policy to understand your rights regarding cancellations and returns.
Legal.refundIntro: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. However, we understand that sometimes things don't go as planned.
Legal.refundRightText: You have the right to cancel your order within 14 days without giving any reason. The withdrawal period will expire after 14 days from the day of the conclusion of the contract.
Legal.refundProcessText: To exercise the right of withdrawal, you must inform us of your decision to cancel this contract by an unequivocal statement (e.g., a letter sent by post or email). You may use the attached model withdrawal form, but it is not obligatory.
Legal.refundEffectsText: If you withdraw from this contract, we shall reimburse to you all payments received from you, including the costs of delivery (with the exception of the supplementary costs resulting from your choice of a type of delivery other than the least expensive type of standard delivery offered by us), without undue delay and in any event not later than 14 days from the day on which we are informed about your decision to withdraw from this contract.

CookieConsent.text: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site traffic. By clicking 'Agree', you consent to our use of cookies.
